titleStmt.title: William H. Towne to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1958

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
No 52 Washington Street
Boston Sept. 29. 1864
Your Excellency

I desire to procure a Commission as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky within and for the State of Massachusetts. Having already Commissions from several States I desire to make the list as complete as possible and request that if no vacancy exists at present, this petition remain on file and that I may be appointed to the first that occurs. I have the honor to refer Your Excellency to Hon Joel Parker Hon Theophilus Parson and Hon Emory Washburn Law Faculty at Harvard University

Very respectfully
William H. Towne
Boston
Comr Deeds
Wm H. Towne
apptd
5th Oct/64
